thread.section_title: Abes of Maine Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Abes of Maine | www.abesofmaine.com
thread.title: J Reid
thread.title_full: Abes of Maine reviewed by J Reid

author: J Reid
title: J Reid
text: I purchased a Sony XBR75X940D on their web site. I got an email to confirm my purchase. I called and they asked if I wanted the tv that was made in Mexico or the made in China model. Geeze!! Lots of lies and stupid stuff to try and get me to buy tge better version. Price increased $1200. I've been through this type of bait and switch crap before. I cancelled the order.
